title: Ward Skin with ugly name
body:
[https://i.gyazo.com/949ad95e0e5462e6f9459b9c6274fd42.png](https://i.gyazo.com/949ad95e0e5462e6f9459b9c6274fd42.png)

I was opening PROJECT chests and I got this as loot. As you can see, the name is not the user-friendly one...

replies.body: Thanks for the report! Looks like a debug stream found its way into the system. We'll restore the name ASAP! :)

Same happened to me too but I cashed it in 
http://prntscr.com/c0xiq0 
http://prntscr.com/c0xik6
 http://prntscr.com/c0xiem

I even spent dust on the ward and Rp on the chest

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
